The purpose of this website is currently to provide a way to easily access the supplementary material to the working paper "Foreigner Directed Gesture: larger, faster, longer" (Valentijn Prové, Bert Oben and Julien Perrez). The manuscript is accessible through [Leuven Working Papers in Linguistics](https://www.arts.kuleuven.be/ling/workingpapers), LWPL39.

Go to the "script" page to see a version of the full code and an output preview.

The full material is made available through GitHub and Zenodo, with the following identifier: 

[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/421998192.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/421998192)
